entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
